| HistoryText             = The Gangers were created by [[Alexei Ganger (Earth-616)|Dr. Alexei Ganger]] to work towards his goal of locating and communicating with the [[Norrin Radd (Earth-616)|Silver Surfer]]. They worked alongside The Doctor's granddaughter [[Sorrentino (Earth-616)|Sorrentino]] to locate the Surfer after he returned to [[Earth]].{{r|Silver Surfer Vol 3 123}} Following Sorrentino's orders they kidnapped [[Phillip Masters (Earth-616)|Phillip Masters]] to lure the Surfer in.{{r|Silver Surfer Vol 3 129}} When the Surfer declined Dr. Ganger's wish to serve as a messiah for them, the Gangers were ordered to turn against him and 'attacked'.{{r|Silver Surfer Vol 3 132}} This attack was in fact a cover to siphon off some of the Surfers [[Power Cosmic]] with which Dr. Ganger sought to create his own messiah.{{r|Silver Surfer Vol 3 133}} The Gangers shot the stolen cosmic energies into the statue of the [[Cosmic Messiah (Earth-616)|Cosmic Messiah]]{{r|Silver Surfer Vol 3 137}} and where then ordered to kidnap [[Alicia Masters (Earth-616)|Alicia Masters]] from her home before being reduced to energy alongside the rest of those present within [[Satori (Fortress)|Satori]] and then later being reconstituted.{{r|Silver Surfer Vol 3 138}}
